title: Vertex AI - Access Transparency in Vertex AI
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Access Transparency in Vertex AI
This page provides an overview of the support [Access Transparency](/assured-workloads/access-transparency/docs/overview) provides for Vertex AI.
content:
## Overview
Access Transparency provides you with logs that capture the actions Google personnel take when accessing your content.
[Cloud Audit Logs](/vertex-ai/docs/general/audit-logging) show when members of your organization access content in your Google Cloud projects. Similarly, Access Transparency provides [logs](/assured-workloads/access-transparency/docs/reading-logs) of the actions taken by Google personnel.
You can [enable Access Transparency](/logging/docs/audit/enable-access-transparency) for a Google Cloud project, if the project resides in an organization.
## Supported services
Access Transparency supports the following Vertex AI services:
- [Generative AI on Vertex AI](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/overview) 
- [Vertex AI AutoML training](/vertex-ai/docs/training/training) 
- [Vertex AI custom training](/vertex-ai/docs/training/overview) 
- [Vertex AI Feature Store](/vertex-ai/docs/featurestore) 
- [Vertex AI Model Monitoring](/vertex-ai/docs/model-monitoring/overview) 
- [Vertex AI Pipelines](/vertex-ai/docs/pipelines) 
- [Vertex AI prediction](/vertex-ai/docs/predictions/overview) 
- [Vertex AI TensorBoard](/vertex-ai/docs/experiments/tensorboard-introduction) 
- [Vertex AI Workbench instances](/vertex-ai/docs/workbench/instances/introduction) 
- [Vertex AI Workbench managed notebooks](/vertex-ai/docs/workbench/managed/introduction) 
- [Vertex AI Workbench user-managed notebooks](/vertex-ai/docs/workbench/user-managed/introduction) 
- [Vertex Explainable AI](/vertex-ai/docs/explainable-ai) 
- [Vertex ML Metadata](/vertex-ai/docs/ml-metadata/introduction) ## Limitations of Access Transparency in Vertex AI
All access to your data in Vertex AI by Google personnel is logged, except for the following scenarios:
- [Scenarios where Access Transparency logs are excluded in all supportedGoogle Cloud services](/assured-workloads/access-transparency/docs/exclusions) 
- Using [custom containers](/vertex-ai/docs/predictions/use-custom-container) to serve [online prediction](/vertex-ai/docs/predictions/get-online-predictions) or [batch prediction](/vertex-ai/docs/predictions/get-batch-predictions) requests from custom-trained models
- Using [Vertex Explainable AI](/vertex-ai/docs/explainable-ai/overview) with [custom containers](/vertex-ai/docs/predictions/use-custom-container) 
- Using AutoML forecasting-related resources such as forecasting datasets and forecasting models.
- Using the following components:- [Generative AI on Vertex AI: Model Tuning (Vision)](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/start/quickstarts/quickstart-tuning) 
- [Generative AI on Vertex AI: Online Prediction (Vision)](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/generate-images) 
- [Vector Search](/vertex-ai/docs/vector-search/overview) 
- [Vertex AI Vizier](/vertex-ai/docs/vizier) 
## What's next
- Learn about the [content of Access Transparency logs](/assured-workloads/access-transparency/docs/reading-logs) .
- Learn [when you would use Access Transparency](/assured-workloads/access-transparency/docs/overview#when-to-use) .
